settings.register_content: Want access to order the coolest gaming furniture available? All you need to get started is a name and an email address. Click "CREATE AN ACCOUNT" below to build and order your dream battlestation.

settings.login_content: Have an existing RESPAWN account? Just click "LOG IN" below to access your account.

settings.home-page-featured-copy: Launched in 1995, OFM is an industry leader in commercial furniture manufacturing and distribution. OFM understands that their skills could be addressed to fit a key consumer need â€“ ergonomic furniture designed specifically with a gamer in mind. RESPAWN by OFM was born, a fully dedicated gaming division. Powered by OFMâ€™s expertise and vast R&D program, RESPAWN is committed to developing accessible gaming furniture with no compromise on quality or features.

settings.partner_description: The National Association of Collegiate Esports (NACE) is a nonprofit membership association organized by and on behalf of our member institutions.
The High school Esports League (HSEL) is a high school league that provides high school level competition across 13 different games and has over 5,800 students participating.

settings.shipping_note: Free same day shipping on all orders to the contiguous United States (48 states). Same day shipping applies to orders processed by noon ET, Mon - Fri excluding holidays. Valid for standard ground delivery only. READ MORE.

settings.review-content-teaser: I'll start by saying that for the price, there isn't a better chair on the market. Their sales staff even answered several questions I had before I purchased and they did so quickly and with a live human!
settings.review-content-all: Not too many companies do that anymore. The chair itself is soft enough to be comfortable, yet firm enough to provide support where needed. The contours along the back are perfect and the butt is super supple to prevent fatigue. I am IN LOVE with the wheels on this chair. They are rubberized and proved excellent grip and control when scooting around without wanting to slide like plastic wheels. The assembly was super quick and concise with great instructions. The hardware is all coated with anti-corrosive oil and blue lock tight. Honestly, it's these small details that show just how dedicated this company is. I would highly recommend this chair!

settings.review-content-teaser: Arrived much faster than I anticipated! I got the blue and it looks fantastic. Very comfortable. Fairly easy to assemble though have someone assist in holding things in place is helpful. Instructions could be a bit clearer.

I recently bought this chair and have been very happy. It is comfortable for my back, legs, and arms. My butt not as much but that can easily be fixed with an extra butt cushion. I was worried at first about the footrest...
settings.review-content-all: ...since it does seem like it could easily just break off, I was worried at first about the footrest since it does seem like it could easily just break off, but even using it as a means to move forward without putting feet on the ground is easy. Overall for the price and great looks I am very pleased. The one suggestion I would make would be to make an optional seat cushion addon for extra comfort.

settings.review-content-teaser: I put many hours in my chairs and i expect performance in every area of a chair. We run a partnered live streaming channel on mixer and when i need to stay cool under long shows on hot days this mesh back...
settings.review-content-all: ...is absolutely pivotal to staying in the game! My height is 5'12 at 155 pounds this chair for my body build was perfect out of the gate. Besides the awesome mesh back the adjustable locking arm height has proven helpful as i can help to adjust my posture. Built in lower (adjustable) lumbar is key! Thanks to Respawn Products ive been able to up the value and aesthetics of our live content. If you do value your posture at work and in game....this is the model id recommend for similar body types ðŸ¤œðŸ¤›

settings.review-content-teaser: I suffer from back issues so finding a good chair isnâ€™t easy, I got my respawn at the local staples store after trying a few other chairs for Black Friday. Iâ€™ve already put about 30-40 hours of use into it and have had no back pain.
settings.review-content-all: Easy to put together and clear instructions. The lumbar support and adjustable recliner makes for a comfortable gaming experience and the head rest is the perfect height for anyone around 6â€™ yâ€™all. 10/10 would recommend to any friends and am even looking at possibly getting a second one for my other gaming area.

settings.partner-description: Trifecta Gaming LLC is a veteran owned and operated multi-platform professional gaming organization that was started in August 2015. Based out of the United States, Jonathan Ross (ShooK), Kyle Rankin (KRanK), restarted Trifecta with a goal of growing and supporting individual gaming personalities and brands to utilize the growing fan-bases for advertisement.
The National Association of Collegiate Esports (NACE) is a nonprofit membership association organized by and on behalf of our member institutions.

Founded in November of 2012, Dare Rising is a leading Multi-Media Gaming Organization 
 striving to become a leader in entertainment. Based in North America, Dare Rising's mission is to support more game title varieties as well as branch our own network beyond YouTubeGaming into other areas including Twitch and eSports. Our goal is to provide effective marketing to companies through our videos, social media, and our eSports presence while we continue to explore and foster player talent.

he Paladins Premier League features our top PC players from around the world. Season 3 is divided into two phases, with each phase lasting 13 weeks. Phase 1 will culminate in a Mid-Season Invitational event this summer, and Phase 2 will lead into HRX 2019 -- where the top teams in the league will fight for the Paladins World Championship title!

Trifecta Gaming LLC is a veteran owned and operated multi-platform professional gaming organization that was started in August 2015. Based out of the United States, Jonathan Ross(ShooK), Kyle Rankin (KRanK), restarted Trifecta with a goal of growing and supporting individual gaming personalities and brands to utilize the growing fan-bases for advertisement and sales.
Motiv8 Gaming strives to build a community of positive individuals working together to improve the gaming industry. Honesty, integrity, and persistence are all core values Motiv8 Gaming stand by.

The SMITE Pro League features our top PC players from all over the world. Season 6 is divided into two phases, with each phase lasting 13 weeks. Phase 1 will culminate in a Mid-Season Invitational event this summer, and Phase 2 will lead into HRX 2019 -- where the top teams in the league will fight for the SMITE World Championship title!

Cylone is an international professional esports organization that currently competes in Smite,Paladins, Gears of War, Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Clash Royale, and more. CycloneGG is owned by Cody Elsen, the Head Coach of the Northwood University Esports Program.
The High school Esports League (HSEL) is a high school league that provides high school level competition across 13 different games and has over 5,800 students participating.
